name: .OAF File Extension
summary: Learn about .OAF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an OAF file with South Park: The Stick of Truth OAF Files Extractor (Windows) or Dungeon Siege III OAF Files Extractor (Windows). Doing so will extract the assets the OAF file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
